The researcher is the one who has given his book on his own, then he says, "I wish I did not give his writers, and I did not know what he calculated (P-49), when he sees the urbanization of the work and the arrogance The death that (died) in the world was the judge, that is, the verse of my command, and I did not send it after it, and I did not create what I have been created, so the guarantee of the death of the mother is not.It is a remembrance, and it is permissible to be because of what he witnessed from the situation, that is, if this situation was the death that destroyed me, because it was a matter of death, then it was a matter One of the deaths is what the death hopes for it.It was permissible for the life of the world to be understood from the righteousness as well, and it is intended for the dead judge.I create alive and the interpretation of the judge with what he mentioned, what was said to be required to find something and do not find in the future to the one who does not.After.
